input: Which one of the following statements is correct?

options.A: Only the Rajya Sabha and not the Lok Sabha can have nominated members
options.B: There is a constitutional provision for nominating two members belonging to the Anglo-Indian Community to the Rajya Sabha.
options.C: There is no constitutional bar for nominated members to be appointed as a Union Minister
options.D: A nominated member can vote both in the Presidential and Vice Presidential elections

explanation: There is no bar on appointment of a person from outside the legislature as Minister, but he cannot continue as Minister for more than 6 months unless he secures a seat in either house of the parliament (by election or nomination) in the meantime .
